content:
Last weekends Bryan National Collegiate didnt feature the best performance from Penn State but it didnt mean the team has lost hope PERIOD

After the teams fourteenth place finish at the event in Browns Summit North Carolina coach Denise St PERIOD Pierre said she still thinks her team will find its form in time to qualify for the NCAA Regional Championships in May PERIOD

Jackie Rogowicz putts during the second round of the Nittany Lion Invitational on Saturday Sept PERIOD   PERIOD

The Nittany Lions currently sit seventy-fourth in the Golfweek rankings and will likely either need to move into the top60 to receive an atlarge bid into Regionals or win the Big Ten Tournament outright to claim the conferences automatic bid PERIOD

I know we are losing time and I dont want to hit the panic button St PERIOD Pierre said PERIOD The message Im telling my players is Stay the course do what youre doing and winning will happen. one of the players St PERIOD Pierres message was aimed at was Jackie Rogowicz PERIOD The sophomore finished second at the River Landing Classic but followed it up with a sixty-ninth place finish at the Briars Creek Invitational and a tie for seventy-sixth in North Carolina PERIOD

Shes been really working on learning different shots and doing some different things with her putting St PERIOD Pierre said of what caused Rogowiczs inconsistent play PERIOD When youre a good player and you start messing around with your skills that way youre just not going to see consistency. rogowicz said she is working on her entire game and getting close to regaining her form PERIOD

Ive had some good rounds but obviously there were some bad ones too Rogowicz said PERIOD The difference between the good rounds and the bad ones was that I didnt make putts. another player who has played up and down within each tournament all season is freshman Maddy Herr PERIOD Herr finished tied for eightieth in Brown Summit and shot her worst score in college during the first round with an  PERIOD

Its such a learning time for Herr St PERIOD Pierre said PERIOD Everything is a first time Im going to cut her some slack shes a freshman. st PERIOD Pierre said Herr may have been distracted during the week by the presence of her sister Erica who plays for Wake Forest and also competed at Briars Creek PERIOD

Im not highly concerned about Maddy St PERIOD Pierre said PERIOD Shes a pretty steady individual PERIOD Sometimes Id like to see her get more energized a little more but on the flipside she doesnt get rocked. st PERIOD Pierre said she took some positives away from the weekend after the Nittany Lions beat the four teams in the field ranked below them and were only four strokes behind 40thranked Oregon PERIOD

To that point we did our job St PERIOD Pierre said PERIOD However we lost out on the opportunity to compete with teams ranked higher to really improve our own ranking. if youre interested in submitting a Letter to the Editor click here PERIOD

Were always interested in hearing about news in our community PERIOD Let us know whats going on
